function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of flexibility in apartment layout for functional reorganization during a pandemic","Impact":"Inability to create working space or isolation areas when needed, leading to compromised social distancing and increased risk of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Implement flexible apartment layouts with movable partitions and modular furniture to enable quick reorganization.","Technologies":"Modular furniture, sliding partitions, flexible building materials.","People":"Residents, building owners, architects, interior designers.","Owner":"Architects, building owners."},{"Description":"Inadequate open and closed spaces for gatherings and social interaction","Impact":"Limited space for social interaction and gatherings, leading to higher risk of indoor transmission of communicable diseases.","Mitigation":"Design and implement open spaces, outdoor spaces, and ventilation systems to facilitate safe social interaction and gatherings.","Technologies":"Outdoor seating, HEPA filters, natural ventilation systems.","People":"Residents, social event organizers, building owners, facility managers.","Owner":"Building owners, architects, facility managers."}]}
